entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS shows Object.ToString() docs instead of the docs present on DateOnly.ToString() #56208
  • IDE0004 being reported on casting nint* to nint via void* #56207
  • Multilayer Directory.Build.props results in CS0105 #56206

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Utilise a common parsing function for comma separated lists. #56205
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/MoveStaticMembers #56204
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/inline_errors #56202
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Change 'convert anonymous type to tuple' into a refactoring #50536
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56210
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56209
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Don't specifically dismiss the sig help session on down key press #51241
    Area-IDE
  • Fix await completion provider to handle non-"true" local function declarations #56196
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
